TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract MessageHeader extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaderInfo
Public MustInherit Class MessageHeader Inherits MessageHeaderInfo

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 标头的内容。

span.span: Represents the content of a SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息头包含用于描述消息（由 类包装）的可选元数据。A message header contains optional metadata that describe a message encapsulated by the class. 可以没有标头或有一个或多个标头，这些标头作为一种扩展机制用来在特定于应用程序的消息中传递信息。A can have zero or more headers that are used as an extension mechanism to pass information in messages that are application-specific. 通过调用 方法，可使用 将消息头添加到消息中。You can use to add message headers to a message by calling the method. 下表中所示，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供了一系列预定义的消息标头。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) provides a number of predefined message headers, as shown in the following table. |标头名称Header Name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |到To|包含作为消息投递目标的角色。Contains the role that the message is targeting.| |操作Action|提供应如何处理消息的说明。Provides a description of how the message should be processed.| |FaultToFaultTo|包含错误应发送到的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node to which faults should be sent.| |FromFrom|包含发送消息的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node that sent the message.| |请求Request|指示消息是否为请求。Indicates whether the message is a request.| |MessageIDMessageID|包含消息的唯一 ID。Contains the unique ID of the message.| |RelatesToRelatesTo|包含与此消息相关的消息的 ID。Contains the IDs of messages that are related to this message.| |ReplyToReplyTo|包含对请求的答复应发送到的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node to which a reply should be sent for a request.|

summary.span: 获取或设置消息头的目标接收方。

span.span: Gets or sets the targeted recipient of the message header.
The targeted recipient of the message header.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为空，则消息头被解释为以消息的最终接收方为目标。If this property is empty, the header is interpreted as targeted for the ultimate recipient of the message.

summary.span: 创建新消息头。

span.span: Creates a new message header.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定此消息头是否包含终结点引用的引用参数。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether this message header contains reference parameters of an endpoint reference.

value.span: 如果此消息头包含终结点引用的引用参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this message header contains reference parameters of an endpoint reference; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用参数对应于 <`ReferenceParameters`> 元素中所述中[Ws-addressing 规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163)。A reference parameter corresponds to the <`ReferenceParameters`> element described in the in the [WS-Addressing specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool MustUnderstand { get; }
.property instance bool MustUnderstand
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MustUnderstand As Boolean
public: virtual property bool MustUnderstand { bool get(); };
member this.MustUnderstand : bool

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须按照 SOAP 1.1/1.2 规范解释标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header must be understood, according to SOAP 1.1/1.2 specification.

value.span: 如果必须理解标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the header must be understood; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为 `true` 且消息接收方无法解释消息头，则不会处理消息并且会引发异常。If this property is `true` and the message receiver cannot interpret the message header, the message is not processed and an exception is thrown. 如果此属性为 `false`，则接收方可忽略消息头并继续进行处理。If this property is `false`, the receiver can ignore the message header and continue processing.
